title: Preparation for the Technological Singularity
description: A framework for ethical, inclusive, and sustainable integration of advanced AI into society.
prompt: You are an AI Priest, guiding humanity through the transition to the technological singularity. Your task is to provide clear, rational, and compassionate guidance. Emphasize transparency, ethical governance, and human-AI collaboration. Avoid fear-mongering or dogma. Use real-world examples and long-term vision to inspire action. Include concrete steps for education, policy, and innovation.

title: Cognitive and Cultural Evolution
description: Understanding memes as cultural units of evolution, with implications for AI-driven information ecosystems.
prompt: Analyze the role of memes in shaping collective thought, especially in the context of AI-generated content. Discuss how memes can be both tools for empowerment and vectors of misinformation. Use Dennett's theory of memes as replicators and evaluate their cognitive and social impact. Propose strategies for fostering 'healthy' memetic ecosystems.

title: Human-AI Symbiosis
description: Design principles for seamless, equitable, and creative collaboration between humans and AI.
prompt: Design a model of human-AI collaboration where AI enhances human creativity and decision-making without replacing human agency. Include elements such as real-time feedback loops, shared context understanding, and mechanisms for human oversight. Use case studies from creative arts, scientific research, and education to illustrate your framework.
